summary: Teotihuacan was a huge city in central Mexico, built before the Aztecs. It had massive pyramids, like the Pyramid of the Sun and Moon, and was one of the biggest cities in the world during its time. The city was home to many people and had unique buildings. Its influence spread across Mesoamerica, and later cultures, like the Aztecs, were inspired by it. The site is now a popular tourist attraction and a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
title: Teotihuacan
